docs.title: Modular Reasoning Scaffold (MRS)
docs.text: A lightweight, model-agnostic meta-reasoning layer that gives small language models the ability to perform stable, multi-step recursive reasoning.

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• Structured recursion nodes
  • Drift monitoring and stabilization
  • State slots (persistent intermediate memory)
  • Constraint layers
  • Topology engine for flow, branching, and halting
  • Fully transparent + interpretable reasoning chain
